title: Slow-Cooked Meatball Stew
directions: Place the potatoes, carrots, onion, celery and meatballs in a 5-qt. slow cooker. Combine the remaining ingredients; pour over meatball mixture.
Cover and cook on low for 9-10 hours or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 3 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 package (12 ounces) frozen fully cooked home-style meatballs
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed tomato soup, undiluted
